Reviews.Title: worked pretty good.
Reviews.Author: Kamilah Kent
Reviews.Content: I needed a laptop for college. Good price, had it from January to May and no problems so far! It's a good buy.

Reviews.Title: wont buy again
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This computer wont even play farmville 2, without crashing, hanging up and dropping off line.  Im not sure if it is the equipment or the refurb..but will stick to new next computer. I relize that buying a refurb is a risk and im sure the company tried, but I also new if it didnt work I was stuck with it....and I assumed a vendor through Amazon all would be ok..but live and learn.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: stephen clark
Reviews.Content: computer worked great for the firts few months I had it but now its starting to slow down...im thinking its just the crappy windows 8. Over all it still works and is an ok computer
